Current ways to make money in mainland China ​

This article will explain how to make money in mainland China in the current environment.

Necessary & Important ​

You need to meet the following conditions to start your money-making journey:

  • You can access the internet freely and visit websites like google.com.
  • You are able to use Telegram normally.
  • You can use exchanges like Binance, HTX, and OKX, or you have your own digital wallet.
  • You want to make money.

Electricity bill & Phone bill ​

We all know that monthly electricity and phone bills are very high. However, these costs are actually virtual; the cost of 100 yuan worth of electricity might only be 80 yuan. So, if you don't want to pay 100 yuan for 100 yuan worth of electricity, I have a way to tell you how to pay 80 yuan for 100 yuan worth of electricity.

Credit cards & Online loans ​

Credit cards, online loans, JD.com's BaiTiao (a consumer credit service), Du Xiaoman (a consumer credit service), Ant Financial's Huabei (a consumer credit service), and many other products all offer low-discount repayment options. For example, I can repay at a 25% discount, meaning I can repay 10,000 yuan with only 7,500 yuan, effectively earning 2,500 yuan. This return of over 25% is more than enough to offset many cryptocurrency and stock market fund investments.
